lines: aap sunre hai premchand ka likha upanyas gaban mere yaani kritika ke saath
naatak us vakt paas hota hai jab rasik samaaj use pansad kar leta hai
baraat ka naatak us vakt paas hota hai jab raah chalate aadamee use pansad kar lete hain
naatak kee pareeksha chaarpaanch ghante tak hotee rahatee hai baraat kee pareeksha ke lie keval itane hee minaton ka samay hota hai
saaree sajaavat saaree daudadhoop aur taiyaaree ka nibataara paanch minaton mein ho jaata hai
agar sabake munh se vaahvaah nikal gaya to tamaasha paas nahin to roopaya mehanat phikr sab akaarath
dayaanaath ka tamaasha paas ho gaya
shahar mein vah teesare darje mein aata gaanv mein avval darje mein aaya
koee baajon kee dhondhonponpon sunakar mast ho raha tha koee motar ko aankhen gaadgaadakar dekh raha tha
kuchh log phulavaariyon ke takht dekhakar lotlot jaate the
aatishabaajee hee manoranjan ka kendr thee

havaiyaan jab sakai se oopar jaateen aur aakaash mein laal hare neele peele kumakumese bikhar jaate jab charkhiyaan chhootateen aur unamen naachate hue mor nikal aate to log mantramugdhse ho jaate the
vaah kya kaareegaree hai jaalapa ke lie in cheejon mein leshamaatr bhee aakarshan na tha
haan vah var ko ek aankh dekhana chaahatee thee vah bhee sabase chhipaakar par us bheedbhaad mein aisa avasar kahaan
dvaarachaar ke samay usakee sakhiyaan use chhat par kheench le gaee aur usane ramaanaath ko dekha
usaka saara viraag saaree udaaseenata saaree manovyatha maano chhoomantar ho gaee thee
munh par harsh kee laalima chha gaee
anuraag sphoorti ka bhandaar hai
dvaarachaar ke baad baraat janavaase chalee gaee
bhojan kee taiyaariyaan hone lageen
kisee ne pooriyaan khaee kisee ne upalon par khichadee pakaee
dehaat ke tamaasha dekhanevaalon ke manoranjan ke lie naachgaana hone laga
das baje sahasa phir baaje bajane lage
maaloom hua ki chadhaava aa raha hai
baraat mein har ek rasm danke kee chot par ada hotee hai
doolha kaleva karane aa raha hai baaje bajane lage
samadhee milane aa raha hai baaje bajane lage
chadhaava jyonhee pahuncha ghar mein halachal mach gaee
streepuroosh boodhejavaan sab chadhaava dekhane ke lie utsuk ho uthe
jyonhee kishtiyaan mandap mein pahuncheen log sab kaam chhodakar dekhane daude
aapas mein dhakkamdhakka hone laga
maanakee pyaas se behaal ho rahee thee kanth sookha jaata tha chadhaava aate hee pyaas bhaag gaee
deenadayaal maare bhookhpyaas ke nirjeevse pade the yah samaachaar sunate hee sachet hokar daude
maanakee ekek cheez ko nikaalnikaalakar dekhane aur dikhaane lagee
vahaan sabhee is kala ke visheshagy the
madooo ne gahane banavae the auraton ne pahane the sabhee aalochana karane lage
choohedantee kitanee sundar hai koee das tole kee hogee vaah saadhe
gyaarah tole se ratteebhar bhee kam nikal jae to kuchh haar jaoon yah sheradahaan to dekho kya haath kee saphaee hai jee chaahata hai kaareegar ke haath choom len
yah bhee baarah tole se kam na hoga
vaah kabhee dekha bhee hai solah tole se kam nikal jae to munh na dikhaoon
haan maal utana chokha nahin hai
yah kangan to dekho bilkul pakkee jadaee hai kitana baareek kaam hai ki aankh nahin thaharatee kaisa damak raha hai
sachche nageene hain
jhoothe nageenon mein yah aab kahaan
cheej to yah gulooband hai kitane khoobasoorat phool hain aur unake beech ke heere kaise chamak rahe hain kisee bangaalee sunaar ne banaaya hoga
kya bangaaliyon ne kaareegaree ka theka le liya hai hamaare desh mein ekseek kaareegar pade hue hain
bangaalee sunaar bechaare unakee kya baraabaree karenge
isee tarah ekek cheej kee aalochana hotee rahee
sahasa kisee ne kaha chandrahaar nahin hai kya
maanakee ne ronee soorat banaakar kaha nahin chandrahaar nahin aaya
ek mahila bolee are chandrahaar nahin aaya
deenadayaal ne gambheer bhaav se kaha aur sabhee cheejen to hain ek chandrahaar hee to nahin hai
usee mahila ne munh banaakar kaha chandrahaar kee baat hee aur hai
maanakee ne chadhaav ko saamane se hataakar kaha bechaaree ke bhaag mein chandrahaar likha hee nahin hai
is golaakaar jamaghat ke peechhe andhere mein aasha aur aakaanksha kee moortisee jaalapa bhee khadee thee
aur sab gahanon ke naam kaan mein aate the chandrahaar ka naam na aata tha
usakee chhaatee dhakdhak kar rahee thee
chandrahaar nahin hai kya shaayad sabake neeche ho is tarah vah man ko samajhaatee rahee
jab maaloom ho gaya chandrahaar nahin hai to usake kaleje par chotsee lag gaee
maaloom hua deh mein rakt kee boond bhee nahin hai
maano use moorchchha aa jaayagee
vah unmaad kee see dasha mein apane kamare mein aaee aur phootphootakar rone lagee
vah laalasa jo aaj saat varsh hue usake hraday mein ankurit huee thee jo is samay pushp aur pallav se ladee khadee thee us par vajrapaat ho gaya
vah harabhara lahalahaata hua paudha jal gaya keval usakee raakh rah gaee
aaj hee ke din par to usakee samast aashaen avalambit theen
durdaiv ne aaj vah avalamb bhee chheen liya
us niraasha ke aavesh mein usaka aisa jee chaahane laga ki apana munh noch daale
usaka vash chalata to vah chadhaave ko uthaakar aag mein phenk detee
kamare mein ek aale par shiv kee moorti rakhee huee thee
usane use uthaakar aisa pataka ki usakee aashaon kee bhaanti vah bhee choorchoor ho gaee
usane nishchay kiya main koee aabhooshan na pahanoongee
aabhooshan pahanane se hota hee kya hai
jo roopviheen hon ve apane ko gahane se sajaen mujhe to eeshvar ne yon hee sundaree banaaya hai main gahane na pahanakar bhee buree na lagoongee
sastee cheejen utha lae jisamen roopaye kharch hote the usaka naam hee na liya
agar ginatee hee ginaanee thee to itane hee daamon mein isake doone gahane aa jaate
vah isee krodh mein bharee baithee thee ki usakee teen sakhiyaan aakar khadee ho gaee
unhonne samajha tha jaalapa ko abhee chadhaav kee kuchh khabar nahin hai
jaalapa ne unhen dekhate hee aankhen ponchh daaleen aur muskaraane lagee
raadha muskaraakar bolee jaalapa maaloom hota hai toone badee tapasya kee thee aisa chadhaav mainne aaj tak nahin dekha tha
ab to teree sab saadh pooree ho gaee
jaalapa ne apanee lambeelambee palaken uthaakar usakee or aise deennajar se dekha maano jeevan mein ab usake lie koee aasha nahin hai
haan bahan sab saadh pooree ho gaee
in shabdon mein kitanee apaar marmaantak vedana bharee huee thee isaka anumaan teenon yuvatiyon mein koee bhee na kar sakee
teenon kautoohal se usakee or taakane lageen maano usaka aashay unakee samajh mein na aaya ho baasantee ne kaha jee chaahata hai kaareegar ke haath choom loon
shahajaadee bolee chadhaava aisa hee hona chaahie ki dekhane vaale bhadak uthen
baasantee tumhaaree saas badee chatur jaan padatee hain koee cheej nahin chhodee
jaalapa ne munh udharakar kaha aisa hee hoga
raadha aur to sab kuchh hai keval chandrahaar nahin hai
shahajaadee ek chandrahaar ke na hone se kya hota hai bahan usakee jagah gulooband to hai
jaalapa ne vakrokti ke bhaav se kaha haan deh mein ek aankh ke na hone se kya hota hai aur sab ang hote hee hain aankhen huee to kya na huee to kya
baalakon ke munh se gambheer baaten sunakar jaise hamen hansee aa jaatee hai usee tarah jaalapa ke munh se yah laalasa se bharee huee baaten sunakar raadha aur baasantee apanee hansee na rok sakeen
haan shahajaadee ko hansee na aaee
yah aabhooshan laalasa usake lie hansane kee baat nahin rone kee baat thee
krtrim sahaanubhooti dikhaatee huee bolee sab na jaane kahaan ke jangalee hain ki aur sab cheejen to lae chandrahaar na lae jo sab gahanon ka raaja hai
laala abhee aate hain to poochhatee hoon ki tumane yah kahaan kee reeti nikaalee hai aisa anarth bhee koee karata hai
raadha aur baasantee dil mein kaamp rahee theen ki jaalapa kaheen taad na jaay
unaka bas chalata to shahajaadee ka munh band kar deteen baarbaar use chup rahane ka ishaara kar rahee theen magar jaalapa ko shahajaadee ka yah vyangy sanvedana se paripoorn jaan pada
sajal netr hokar bolee kya karogee poochhakar bahan jo hona tha so ho gaya
shahajaadee tum poochhane ko kahatee ho main roolaakar chhodoongee
mere chadhaav par kangan nahin aaya tha us vakt man aisa khakra hua ki saare gahanon par laat maar doon
jab tak kangan na ban gae main neend bhar soee nahin
raadha to kya tum jaanatee ho jaalapa ka chandrahaar na banega
shahajaadee banega tab banega is avasar par to nahin bana
daspaanch kee cheez to hai nahin ki jab chaaha banava liya saikadon ka kharch hai phir kaareegar to hamesha achchhe nahin milate
jaalapa ka bhagn hraday shahajaadee kee in baaton se maano jee utha vah roondhe kanth se bolee yahee to main bhee sochatee hoon bahan jab aaj na mila to phir kya milega
raadha aur baasantee manheeman shahajaadee ko kos rahee theen aur thappad dikhadikhaakar dhamaka rahee theen par shahajaadee ko is vakt tamaashe ka maja aa raha tha
bolee nahin yah baat nahin hai jallee aagrah karane se sab kuchh ho sakata hai saassasur ko baarbaar yaad dilaatee rahana
bahanoeejee se dochaar din roothe rahane se bhee bahut kuchh kaam nikal sakata hai
bas yahee samajh lo ki gharavaale chain na lene paen yah baat haradam unake dhyaan mein rahe
unhen maaloom ho jaay ki bina chandrahaar banavae kushal nahin
tum zara bhee dheelee padeen aur kaam bigada
raadha ne hansee ko rokate hue kaha inase na bane to tumhen bula len kyon ab uthogee ki saaree raat upadesh hee karatee rahogee
shahajaadee chalatee hoon aisee kya bhaagad padee hai
haan khoob yaad aaee kyon jallee teree ammaajee ke paas bada achchha chandrahaar hai
tujhe na dengee
jaalapa ne ek lambee saans lekar kaha kya kahoon bahan mujhe to aasha nahin hai
shahajaadee ek baar kahakar dekho to ab unake kaun pahananeodhane ke din baithe hain
jaalapa mujhase to na kaha jaayaga
shahajaadee main kah doongee
jaalapa nahinnahin tumhaare haath jodatee hoon
main zara unake maatrsneh kee pareeksha lena chaahatee hoon
baasantee ne shahajaadee ka haath pakadakar kaha ab uthegee bhee ki yahaan saaree raat upadesh hee detee rahegee
shahajaadee uthee par jaalapa raasta rokakar khadee ho gaee aur bolee nahin abhee baitho bahan tumhaare pairon padatee hoon
shahajaadee jab yah donon chudailen baithane bhee den
main to tumhen gur sikhaatee hoon aur yah donon mujh par jhallaatee hain
sun nahin rahee ho main bhee vish kee gaanth hoon
baasantee vish kee gaanth to too hai hee
shahajaadee tum bhee to sasuraal se saalabhar baad aaee ho kaunkaunsee naee cheejen banava laee
baasantee aur tumane teen saal mein kya banava liya
shahajaadee meree baat chhodo mera khasam to meree baat hee nahin poochhata
raadha prem ke saamane gahanon ka koee mooly nahin
shahajaadee to sookha prem tumheen ko gale
itane mein maanakee ne aakar kaha tum teenon yahaan baithee kya kar rahee ho chalo vahaan log khaana khaane aa rahe hain
teenon yuvatiyaan chalee gaee
jaalapa maata ke gale mein chandrahaar kee shobha dekhakar manheeman sochane lagee gahanon se inaka jee ab tak nahin bhara
